plugins.name: code-review-plugin
plugins.description: Comprehensive code review plugin with security analysis, quality checks, and PR review capabilities. Supports Go, Python, and JavaScript/TypeScript with GitHub integration.

plugins.name: taskmaster-plugin
plugins.description: Complete project management with Taskmaster MCP: PRD creation, task decomposition, and workflow automation. Features /next, /run, /current commands for streamlined development workflow. Integrates AI-powered task management with Claude Code.
